tool_description: Maps fire suppression coverage zones and identifies optimal placement of sprinklers, detectors, and suppression equipment within the protected space.

floor_plan_dimensions.description: Length and width dimensions of each floor in feet

system_type.description: Type of suppression system being mapped

sprinkler_range.description: Effective range of each sprinkler in feet

obstruction_locations.description: Coordinates of obstructions that may block coverage

error_messages: Invalid floor plan dimensions: Each dimension must be between 10 and 1000 feet.
Unsupported system type: Must be a recognized fire suppression system type.
Invalid sprinkler range: Must be between 3 and 15 feet.
Invalid obstruction format: Obstructions must be specified as coordinate strings.
usage: Provide floor plan dimensions as length/width pairs, specify system type, and optionally set sprinkler range and obstruction locations. The tool will generate coverage maps showing optimal equipment placement.

coverage_zones.description: Defined coverage zones within the protected space

coverage_percentage.description: Percentage of total area covered by the system

dead_zones.description: Areas with inadequate coverage that need attention

mapping_summary.description: Summary of coverage analysis and recommendations
